tool_description: Maps geological strata and layer sequences from multiple sample points to create stratigraphic profiles.

sample_points.description: List of sample point IDs with depth data

depth_range_start.description: Starting depth for analysis in meters

depth_range_end.description: Ending depth for analysis in meters

layer_thickness_min.description: Minimum significant layer thickness in meters

error_messages: Insufficient sample points: Need at least 3 sample points for stratigraphic correlation.
Invalid depth range: End depth must be greater than start depth.
Sample data incomplete: Some sample points lack required depth or formation data.
Invalid mapping method: Use one of [correlation, interpolation, trend_analysis].
Inconsistent stratigraphy: Unable to correlate layers across sample points.
usage: Provide survey area, sample points, mapping method, and depth parameters to generate stratigraphic layer maps.
